website_summaries.verdict: This single-fold ramp can be carried like a suitcase by one person. We appreciate the additional safety video and security pins.
pros: Critical seams welded, not just riveted
cons: Protruding hinges can be a tripping hazard for walkers
Incline angle may be too steep for some users

customer_reviews.title: iT IS SOOOOO EASY TO SET UP!
customer_reviews.text: Oh, it is wonderful. It works! At only 15 lbs even an old lady (me) can set it up. It makes life so much easier and it is stable. It's well-made and so easy to put away after use. I am so proud of myself for thinking there might be something like this on Amazon. THANK YOU, AMAZON!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: CKH

customer_reviews.title: Best ramp for the $!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my parents front door home entrance. The quality is very good. Its simple enough to handle. Its a little heavy for them to handle so someone sets it up for them when the occasion arises and its needed. One thing we discovered is that their screen door is about 3/16" interferring with the top of this ramp. Since the screen door is a wood frame, we need to take it off the hinges and shave the bottom edge of the door down. Otherwise, this is a take out of the box and use. The no-skid surface is great too.
customer_reviews.author: digikeiki

customer_reviews.title: Very good but....
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and solid. BUT be careful about clearance for steps. I use it at the side of the porch where there aren't any steps. This ramp has vertical support ridges underneath that will hit steps that are deeper than 12". It won't work on many porches unless they have very narrow steps, say underneath 10". Not enough angle especially on longer ramps. I'm not talking about step height or width but depth. It's basic geometry.
customer_reviews.author: Donald F. Lessnau

customer_reviews.title: Bought two
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lightweight and portable ramp for Mom' electric chair. I decided on this ramp because of the lightweight and ability to fold it up and throwing it in the trunk of my car when needed. This ramp is very lightweight and sturdy. My sister has no problem folding it up and placing it in the trunk of her car. We ended up buying a second one shortly after buying the first. No regrets
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautifully constructed, solidly welded
customer_reviews.text: A completely outstanding product which allowed my friend to roll her heavy power wheelchair over otherwise impassible steps. Made in USA, strong, beautifully constructed, solidly welded, excellent surface coating, useful instructions, I can't say too much nice about this product and it's affordable as well. Just make sure the dimensions are correct for your application -- check the manufacturer web site for directions on how to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Peabody

customer_reviews.title: BUY WITH CONFIDENCE! EXCELLENT DESIGN!  BRING NEW FREEDOM TO THE WHEELCHAIR BOUND!
customer_reviews.text: Prairie View Industries did an excellent job of getting this ramp all the way to Alaska. The ramp has a very intelligent design. Although the dimensions of the large ramp could be cumbersome, this is mitigated by creating a 'fold-up' design in which the actual dimensions are halved, allow for greater portability and usability. The is very sturdy comprised of excellent materials and manufacturing, The soldering points are neat and precise. There is no superfluous or messy solder. The edges of the ramp are smooth , the black tread is very neat, tight and safe These ramps are must-have items for those with mobility challenges.
customer_reviews.author: Nice Lady

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my father to be able to navigate the 4" drop in / out of the garage so he can use his golf cart. It works perfectly. He no longer has to wrestle with his walker or grab on to the door frame while trying to get up and down. The hinges in the middle do not affect it's use or cause a safety issue for us. It is light and can be folded up and put of the way if needed. Will be purchasing a second one in the future for him to navigate the threshold in our Florida room. Very satisfied with purchase. The ramp was delivered faster than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Chulapit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my garage 4 inch step up!
customer_reviews.text: This ramp is awesome! I'm using it in the garage where I have about a 4 inch step up and can load up the folding grocery cart I bought and just wheel it over this ramp really easy. It also folds in half and has a handle to carry it, easy to store! Is well made and not super heavy. I would buy this again!!
customer_reviews.author: Houston

customer_reviews.title: This ramp is a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: This 3ft ramp was shorter than I would have liked, but it was the longest that would work with my front step and walk configuration. But, it makes pushing the wheelchair occupied by my wife in and out of the house a lot easier. Since I don't have to raise the front wheels off the ground when we go into our house, they don't turn sidewise or backwards making it a struggle to go over the threshold. The ramp is light, conveniently folds in half and is easy to carry like a suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S.

customer_reviews.title: Prairie Wheelchair Ramp
customer_reviews.text: It’s ordered the 3ft portable ramp for my 140 lb 10 year old German Shepard that has Arthritis. It has a 8 inch incline. It is Very Well made. Welded hinges folds easily with a handle to carry. It’s a quality product for a reasonable price. 5 Stars Yay!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Ramp
customer_reviews.text: This has been extremely helpful for me to navigate the small step in the front of our home after being diagnosed with osteonecrosis of both hips. We have used the ramp for my walker, a wheelchair and people visiting are comfortable walking on it. As a registered nurse, I needed to ensure that I felt completely secure and wanted to make sure there was no chance of falling. This is an excellent product, easy to install while being portable with folding.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Works good and fairly light for 4” curb (partially assisted)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this slightly used and came in excellent condition. Used it for a 4” drop in front of sliding glass door and for a 4” curb. Took good bit of effort to get up with wheelchair unassisted for my grandma who refused help. A four foot would of been better for the 4” curb as its 1 foot length of ramp per 1 inch rise of curb for unassisted but for the cost and temporary usage this was great.
customer_reviews.author: James Moore

customer_reviews.title: Wheelchair Ramp is Easy to Use and Helpful
customer_reviews.text: What a lifesaver! This size is perfect for a single step and is lightweight, but strong. Without it, we were pretty much stranded in our house. Now I can easily set it up (It can be installed permanently, too) and roll my husband's wheelchair right out to the car. Bolts to make the permanent install are included, along with great written and video instructions for use. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a Lifesaver.
customer_reviews.text: Life Saver. This has helped me and my family tremendously as it makes it so much easier to get my mother in and out of the house easily. It's very sturdy and easy to put in place and fold away once finished.
customer_reviews.author: Wasiejah

customer_reviews.title: We have used the ramp daily for a year and half and it is still as good as new
customer_reviews.text: This ramp is extremely durable and safe. We have used the ramp daily for a year and half and it is still as good as new. My cousin is an adult male who weighs about 112llbs and is wheel chair bound. It is also easily transported through various parts of the house. It's not that long, so I wouldn't recommend for anything with more than two steps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: If you need serious ramp, one that is perfection and trustworthy for wheelchair user. This is the brand for you. The heavy duty quality and rough sand paper like covering on ramp makes it the safest for caregiver and wheelchair occupant. Prairie View Industries brand will always be my choice for ramps.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: It’s wide enough and long enough for any need!
customer_reviews.text: This ramp is absolutely what we needed for a doorway into our garage that has a step down. My husband has to use a walker and sometimes a wheelchair so this ramp is perfect for us. The size is more than adequate and it’s very sturdy!! And I like that it can fold up for storage if necessary!
customer_reviews.author: BeaderD0685

customer_reviews.title: So happy to quickly descend into that room
customer_reviews.text: Comes ready for immediate use. We have a one 6 inch step down into our living room. So happy to quickly descend into that room. However, going up requires assistance because of absence of railing. I am working on it. Good quality ramp.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Works really well. We have a very steep step ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. We have a very steep step up almost 4 inches on our porch and it works. Feels safe and doesn't move while using for electric wheel chair
customer_reviews.author: Laura Monroe

customer_reviews.title: It was a good option instead of building a ramp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my golden retriever who is getting old and having a hard time with a bigger step where he goes in and out of sliding glass doors into the yard. It was a good option instead of building a ramp, it is stable and portable to. Much easier for my senior dog now to go in and out and less stress on his hips and back.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Riedel

customer_reviews.title: Wow  very nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item couples off month ago and where I go i take it ,, this Ram bought it for my mom she’s disabled and when I took her any appointments there is levels in the house we use it or she’s go in a back yard patios we used for her it’s prett strong and wonderful to be ,, it’s easy to hold & not very heavy & you can easily put in your trunk , size is best to be too ,, thnx
customer_reviews.author: sscrusir007

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY AND SO CONVENIENT
customer_reviews.text: Had purchased a different brand ramp and got rid of it. This ramp is of good quality and is so convenient to just fold up and carry into the garage because of the handle. I like the fact that it has the black gripper on it. I like this product very much for its quality and easy fold up storage.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn L.

customer_reviews.title: Every wheel chair needs one of these.
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is in a wheelchair and these are our go to for easy ramps. We have one at each entrance that we use daily. Easy to just open up and lay down at the entrance. Makes life easier to roll her in and out.
customer_reviews.author: twix

customer_reviews.title: Good aid
customer_reviews.text: Was getting foot surgery and was using a wheelchair. This was perfect. I used it indoors because I have a sunken livingroom. I like that is was portable, because I wanted to use it somewhere else it was easy to fold. Saying that, it was nice that I could store it without it taking a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: TV

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Instructions aren't complete to understand how to set up. Product is sturdy and works fine. I would review other like products prior to going with this. I was in a rush for a ramp for my mother and didn't do enough study.
customer_reviews.author: N. Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: 4 ft long aluminum ramp
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for 7 inch high one step porch for father in laws wheelchair.folds up for easy storage
customer_reviews.author: danny lopez

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy but lightweight ramp. The automatic, in-floor ramp in my Roll-X van is broken, so I use this with every errand... Put it out, roll down my son, the fold it in half and place in the back. It works great. I bought the 3 foot length since I'll be lifting it so often and need to store in van all the time, and it's a bit steep even though the van is only 6 inches from ground. But the size is key for us, but a 4 foot one probably would have been better. I'm sure I'll buy another one in a different ramp for use on a sidewalk near our front door.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Rapp

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and works great.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and works great. I am using this outside my back porch to accommodate my mother who uses a rollator to walk. I have a 3 inch step from the porch to the driveway and this ramp works perfect. It took me about 30 seconds to put it in place. I have not used the pins provided to secure it to the brick, but so far (3 months) it has stayed in place. My mother feels secure using it and it has helped her a lot.
customer_reviews.author: PepperHawk

customer_reviews.title: Prairie View Industries 3 foot ramp.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 5 foot Costway ramp recently. Very pleased with it. High quality I was very disappointed in the 3 foot Prairie View Industries ramp that I received today. Very poor quality. It looks like a 6 year old did the welding. It does not look like it would safely support a 220 lb. person in a wheelchair. Not worth $101. Not worth the safety risk.
customer_reviews.author: S. Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: best one I've found
customer_reviews.text: This ramp is the best of all I've seen and used as the approach side has no "hump" to get over (or get stuck on)
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hain

customer_reviews.title: This really worked beautifully for bringing my husband into the house in a ...
customer_reviews.text: This really worked beautifully for bringing my husband into the house in a wheelchair. However I believe the wrong pamphlet is included in the box. It showed an underside and a handle which this didn't have, so I sent it back and ordered again. Then we realized the brochure must have been for the longer ramp, and shouldn't have been included with this one. This one didn't need it and worked out okay, because I needed a smaller one. Very confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Roselyn Bergmann

customer_reviews.title: works fine except the edges (on both side and center) are ...
customer_reviews.text: works fine except the edges (on both side and center) are about 2 inches deep and from my front door or my house to the front porch, there is an unconventional steep (about 14 ins wide) that prevented the ramp from positioning flat over this step. corrected this by cutting small incisions into the edges with a hacksaw. This enabled the ramp to lay flat from the door to the porch.
customer_reviews.author: he

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect fit in my sliding glass doorway out my back door to roll down on my wheelchair. About to order another for another doorway that needs a ramp
customer_reviews.author: Christen

customer_reviews.title: ... sharp edges but a little emery cloth and a fine file fixed them
customer_reviews.text: Some sharp edges but a little emery cloth and a fine file fixed them. I could have left them but to me they were sharp as I use to work in the sheet metal industry. All welds are strong done with a MIG welder should last a life time.
customer_reviews.author: W. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! Easy to install. Just set it up and go!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Good ramp.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very study ramp; easy to fold; a bit bulky/heavy to take in and out a lot, but not bad; the handle makes it easier to lift.
customer_reviews.author: C. sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding. just what the doctor ordered. Placed it ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding. just what the doctor ordered. Placed it in kitchen doorway leading into the garage now I can use my electric wheelchair to get to my car instead pf my walker. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sarge

customer_reviews.title: Great ramps!
customer_reviews.text: I love these ramps. This is the third one of these I've bought and I use them to get all around my house and garage in my power chair.
customer_reviews.author: James West

customer_reviews.title: Fold & Go
customer_reviews.text: Easy to carry, unfold, set up, and take away. Light weight, simple set up, great handle, and nonskid wheel surface.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent S.

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: Needed these after my 95 year old mother came to live with us. They help us get her in and out of the house since she cannot do stairs. Worth the money but a bit of a pain to have to set them up and take them down each time we use them but our house does not allow for a permanent ramp and these are the next best thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ken K

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for my father who is in a wheelchair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Moms house
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Moms house. She was so excited that I bought her this and tried it out in all her doorways! Worked like a charm, and it's portable. Will be nice to take it on the road in the future.
customer_reviews.author: keZiah

customer_reviews.title: Good ramp!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased it for a neighbor in a wheelchair and it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Roger M

customer_reviews.title: Great for those nuisance one-step front door steps.
customer_reviews.text: Well designed ramps. Plenty of weight load capabilitiy. Easy to carry and set-up. No rough spots or burrs around edges. Really good welding techniques.
customer_reviews.author: R.S. Hill

customer_reviews.title: It is lightweight and with the handle it can easily be moved with one hand from location to location ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ramp to assist in moving my mom's wheelchair into our house when she visits and from room-to-room inside the house also. It worked incredibly well. It is lightweight and with the handle it can easily be moved with one hand from location to location in the house to accommodate the different levels of our home. These are mostly door thresholds and elevation changes of around 5 inches. The best part was how much more comfortable she was as she was pushed along the ramp compared to how she felt in the past when we had to lift her in the wheelchair over these obstructions.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Benderman

customer_reviews.title: ... at a slider to a patio and it works fine. It is the right size
customer_reviews.text: Using this at a slider to a patio and it works fine. It is the right size, non slip and folds up when not in use. It is safe enough so my husband can go up and down in his wheelchair by himself.
customer_reviews.author: Calico

customer_reviews.title: Portable Ramp
customer_reviews.text: This ramp is easy to move, and place in position. My 80 year old mother is able to move it from one location to another with ease. It's very sturdy, as well as light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Honeycutt

customer_reviews.title: Yes I recommend it. Nice and light if you need to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for my dads wheelchair. Use it at my back porch. Yes I recommend it. Nice and light if you need to move it around. I have one 3 ft and one 4 ft ramp.
customer_reviews.author: P. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great little ramp.
customer_reviews.text: I had to build a new two layer deck with Handicap ramps leading to my parking area. The little ramp is the perfect transition at the end. It has a nice lip at the end for making it stationary. I used #10 x2" flat head wood screws to eliminate a trip hazard, and it's perfect. I Will sure recommend Prairie View Industries to all my friends. Thanks Guys.
customer_reviews.author: Canon54

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!  Just what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: Works well with both the back door and side door. Easy to move around and we can even still close the door while it's down, so we don't have to move it. Very glad we ordered this!
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Works as described and makes moving someone in a wheelchair and easier and safer task. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa M.

customer_reviews.title: just right
customer_reviews.text: This is just a perfect step to have around the house and to take with me. Fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: lovethesun

customer_reviews.title: Easy breezy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to roll on and off the porch with this ramp. Stays in place and is perfect for the 4 inch rise through the doorway into the house.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to set up and put away
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and durable. It is easy to set up and put away. Can easily be stowed in a trunk for travel.
customer_reviews.author: randell perkins

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as I expected but works for what I needed ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as I expected but works for what I needed it for. I will not have a heavy wheelchair on it just a walker so will have to re-post if a wheelchair is needed later.
customer_reviews.author: Benita Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Alex
customer_reviews.text: It works for what we need them to do. All we need it for is to be able to get my elderly grandma in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and just the right angle for our front entry door. I highly recommend this ramp for any height variation of 4 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Keeny

customer_reviews.title: I have to agree with one of the other opinions ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to agree with one of the other opinions. This ramp has a flaw in the structural design underneath which makes it unacceptable on thresholds 2" high or less. The two welded support structures do not connect at the correct angle. The lower structural weld is below the upper and it hits the ground if the threshold is not high enough and the ramp teeter totters. The distance of the teeter totter depends on your threshold height. The lower the threshold the more teeter.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent selection, it is made of the highest quality materials and safety pins are included just in case you will use the ramp in a permanent location. In my case, the 3' per 30" had a weigh capacity of 600 pounds, good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Norat Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Not only for use with wheelchair but ambulance service liked it too for bringing patient out of front door. Smooth move.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Lafferty

customer_reviews.title: Good ramp
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a step down between two rooms. Sturdy and good grip.
customer_reviews.author: Parogi

customer_reviews.title: Does what would be expected of this product.
customer_reviews.text: Does what would be expected of this product. Doubles between wheelchair ramp and a ramp to get power equipment in and out of the shed.
customer_reviews.author: Dave W

customer_reviews.title: SUPER PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.text: SUPER PRODUCT.....Makes it so much easier to get patient in transport chair out of the sliding glass door, I use this on the outside and the Threshold Ramp 12in x 32 in. on the inside and together they are wonderful....Able to get my Mother our doors without any problem at all....Easy to fold and store away until needed again.....
customer_reviews.author: Linda W.

customer_reviews.title: folds easy, perfect handle
customer_reviews.text: Exellent ramp. All aluminum, lightweight, folds easy, perfect handle. Stays in place even without the pins that can be installed.
customer_reviews.author: Russ t.

customer_reviews.title: Life-changing
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our dad and he has even more freedom in his power chair!! Best purchase ever!! He keeps it handy in his handicap accessible van, just in case!! Doesn’t take up much space either!! Great product for a great price!!
customer_reviews.author: LKis

customer_reviews.title: A little steep
customer_reviews.text: Ramp is good quality and a snap to place. We have a six inch step and they recommended a three foot ramp. Got it for our parents who are in their nineties. It is a bit steep for them. I would recommend a longer one with less incline for older folks.
customer_reviews.author: Si S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for 8 inch step.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for 8 inch step. Sturdy enough to carry 200lbs.
customer_reviews.author: P. Sroka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our needs. Light and easy to use. Can take along with if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia F. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: We needed the portability of a sturdy ramp to allow for easy entry to otherwise inaccessible doorways. Now, my sister can 'visit' others' homes without difficulty of trying to get 'into' the house. The product is as listed; it is lightweight and the quality seems high.
customer_reviews.author: A. L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for one step. Easy to fold up and move
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed. They work well and even ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. They work well and even without the posts they don’t side.
customer_reviews.author: Mah-Jongg Queen

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my one step. Step is 7 inches tall. Love it. No slipping during rainy weather.
customer_reviews.author: lost

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Used by someone in a mobility cart to go from porch through door threshold over a six-inch rise.Worked perfectly. Be sure to use the guide to determine how long the ramp should be for the height involved.
customer_reviews.author: Eclectic Esoteric

customer_reviews.title: The ramp is of very good quality. It is easy to fold and easy ...
customer_reviews.text: The ramp is of very good quality. It is easy to fold and easy to move. I use it to ascend one step into my house and it fits my need perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: clemente

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Works perfectly for a wheelchair ramp in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Works perfectly for a wheelchair ramp in our garage to go from the garage to the house! Easy assembly and install. Nothing to it! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Susan K

customer_reviews.title: Found it on Amazon at the best price. It is very secure/strong
customer_reviews.text: Found it on Amazon at the best price. It is very secure/strong. Made in America and made very well. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Ramp Solid!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the ramp to use at our front door. The ramp is sturdily built with solid welds though easy to carry setup and remove. It folds up so it can be taken in a car trunk to a remote site.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its working well for my walker and power chair in and out my house.
customer_reviews.author: Amted amidonazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Really helps get wife in and out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Really helps get wife in and out of the house. Even take it with us when we go to visit relatives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This ramp is perfect for my elderly mom
customer_reviews.text: This ramp is perfect for my elderly mom. She’s not in a wheelchair thankfully but she uses a walker and the ramp is extremely helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Ivonne Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Met need for walker and wheel chair, Came on time and slope calculations helped.
customer_reviews.author: Peter T

customer_reviews.title: Does WHAT IT IS INTENDED FOR
customer_reviews.text: I was going to build one but I decided to give this one a try and it does exactly what it is intended for. I have 2 different levels that I use it for, and the ramp I ordered works for both steps.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon - Tucson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution for my mother’s needs. Easy to place and folds back up for quick storage.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Solid ramp
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed to get over the threshold to our home in a wheelchair. Folds up and fits easily in front closet.
customer_reviews.author: TC Rider

customer_reviews.title: Fits the need perfect
customer_reviews.text: Light, easy to handle, supports the weight perfectly, Makes the travel and access so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: LAURIE ANN

customer_reviews.title: This ramp is rock solid!  High quality and will support LOTS of weight.
customer_reviews.text: This ramp is rock solid! High quality and will support LOTS of weight. I recommend this product to anyone in need!
customer_reviews.author: FORENSIC DTS, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Ramp does As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: My sister tried to solve the problem of buying a ramp. Hers did not work at all. This thing is brilliant. Works first time, everytime. A real workhorse. Delighted with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey W. Reich

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Ramps
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 3 foot ramps for a 2.5 inch step and it worked very well with my power wheelchair. The non-slip surface is very course and works well even when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Stone

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: We use this off the family room to go onto the back deck and to go out the front door. Easy to use, lightweight and will travel well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jagiella

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. Super portable. Light weight. Easy to use. Works great. Saved us a lot of money on permanent changes.
customer_reviews.author: AvdH

customer_reviews.title: Nice ramp works great. Has lifetime warranty. Fast service.
customer_reviews.text: Will buy again. Nice and secure ramp. Easy to handel and light weight. The 3' works great. I have a 2" and 4" exit step down. It works great on either one...
customer_reviews.author: wwc10

customer_reviews.title: Super simple
customer_reviews.text: This is great for getting my mom into my house with her wheelchair; no assembly required; I just took it out of the box and used it on my front steps.
customer_reviews.author: Joel C. Tomski

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: bought for father in law and his transport chair. We only have a 6" step and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Folds for portability in my car
customer_reviews.text: I carry this size, 3 ft, in my car. Public places are ADA compliant but my friends houses are not, This really is essential for a busy social life.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Malin

customer_reviews.title: A much better ramp than one made of wood
customer_reviews.text: A much better ramp than one made of wood. My mother-in-law is tickled pink to have this to get in and out of the house using her walker.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Starke

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but heavy and I use it from time to ...
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy but heavy and I use it from time to time. Hence, I must pick it up and put it down when I want to use. Regardless, I am happy with it and I would purchase again. It is great when I use a cart to bring in heavy items from the garage, like 5 gallon water jugs, groceries, etc.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great price, well made.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for a small step and a power wheelchair.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey's Mom

customer_reviews.title: very pleased with ramp
customer_reviews.text: very pleased with ramp. my problem is that the concrete platform that the ramp butts up to is a little short in width. makes it difficult to make a turn off ramp without lifting the chair to get it into position to push the chair through the door. other than that I am pleased with all aspects of the 3' ramp.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda W. Holt

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Just fine for getting in and out of the house
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for wheelchairs
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was as advertised and product is well built. This is a very solid ramp. It is perfect for wheelchairs.Get the longer model for walker use to reduce the incline.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald B.

product_meta.title: Prairie View Industries SFW330 Portable Singlefold Ramp, 3 Feet x 30 Inch
product_meta.description: Size:3 Feet x 30 InchPortable and lightweight aluminum ramp folds conveniently in half for ease in carrying and storage. It comes with a handle and carries like a suit case. The ramp has welded fabrication for strength and the entire walking surface is covered with anti-slip traction tape and provides maximum traction even when the ramp or wheels of chair are scooter are wet. Provides the assurance that the ramp will hold its rated capacity. The ramp width is 30" and designed to work with any wheel configuration of wheelchair or scooter. Ramps come complete with safety instruction video and security pins for additional safety.This Ramp Has Been Tested at a 3X Safety Factor.
feature_bullets: Surface is covered with anti-slip skid resistant tape for maximum traction
Full 30" wide platform design for maximum support and stability. Capacity - 800 Pounds
Has a handle for easy carrying. Carries like a suitcase.. Durable welded construction
Accommodates Wheelchairs and Scooters with Various Wheel Configurations

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
